Subject: Server IP and Port  “not set” on client
Description:
hello 

After installing the EPP client on a customer server, I am experiencing an issue. 

The EPP Client - Server IP and Port settings are set to “Not set”, so normal communication is not possible. 

I am attaching the debug log and related screenshots. 
Please check the workaround for this issue. 

Notes: The customer is in an airgapped environment, so remote support is not possible.
Solution_Comment__c:
After several attempts, I installed client version 5.8.2.5 and
and confirmed that it is communicating normally.

We will reopen the case at a later date.
